english_example_sentence: If the children were quiet, their mother would allow them to play outside.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы дети были тихими, их мать разрешила бы им играть на улице.
turkish_example_sentence: Eğer çocuklar sessiz olsalar, anne onlara dışarıda oynamaya izin verseler.
